website_summaries.verdict: This variety pack of powder mix has simple ingredients with a great taste.
pros: Junket makes a light, soft batch of ice cream
There are two sets of vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry favors
There are even instructions on how to make ice cream without an ice cream maker
Works just as well in soft-serve machines as it does in ice cream machines
cons: Some find it expensive for the amount included

customer_reviews.title: Legit Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cuisinart soft serve ice cream maker and this mix bundle was perfect. If you want recognizable flavors I'd say this is the pack. I was one of those kids that had a Mr Softee ice cream truck visit where I lived and the chocolate and vanilla really are throw backs to that.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Super Easy Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with my Cuisinart Ice Cream maker. I used the Junket strawberry ice cream mix. I used their suggested ingredients and wow, it is super good! I love ice cream and now can make it at home. I am really impressed and can't wait to try the vanilla and chocolate mixes. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchase an ice cream maker for the family and we decided to use these flavors. Out of all the flavors my family's favorite was the strawberry. The next best flavor would be the vanilla and the lease would be the chocolate. That's just our opinion though these were really great and easy to mix I have to use two boxes at a time because of my large mixer. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacied

customer_reviews.title: Very light, tasty soft ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: I can't ingest cream or high fat food without getting abdominal distress. But I love soft ice cream. I made these with 2 cups of 2% milk instead of the whole milk and cream that is suggested on the boxes. Wonderful taste and texture!
customer_reviews.author: Tutti Bello

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for Kid's Parties...That's About All
customer_reviews.text: Sort of expensive, given the ingredients and amount that each box will make. We bought the bundle for a birthday party for a granddaughter, and the kids ate it, but we adults didn't care for the taste...all three flavors were a bit "off" and washed-out tasting. Convenient for children's parties if you want to go to the trouble of making ice cream instead of buying the small serving cups, so three stars for that, and two for taste...probably won't buy this product again though, except for parties...
customer_reviews.author: Carl Cloer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ICE CREAM
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best ice cream for ice cream machines that there is. I have tried several other brands and they don't compare. I have used 2% milk and combined it with half and half and it comes out even better. It is much better than even the most expensive store bought ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: jmw

customer_reviews.title: ... tried the chocolate from this assortment but it was amazing. It was much better than the recipe I ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only tried the chocolate from this assortment but it was amazing. It was much better than the recipe I tried to use a few before that was rather complex. Save yourself the trouble and use this mix. I made it a little extra thick and creamy by adding a raw egg to the mixture before freezing.
customer_reviews.author: MS Gulf Coast Girl

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it in my Electric Cuisinart Ice Cream Freezer. I used Almond Milk and Half 'n Half instead of Low Calorie Whole Milk and Heavy Cream. It came out great. Since the carbohydrate count is 25g per serving with whole milk, what would the count be using the Almond Milk and Half 'n Half?
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use. Just add heavy whipping cream and turn on the machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small soft serve ice cream machine and since it’s just my hubby and I it’s enough for us to get 2 serving a piece. I wish I could get a package of all vanilla. My hubby loves strawberry. I haven’t tried the chocolate yet
customer_reviews.author: Beulah M Best

customer_reviews.title: Don't know  amazon prime didn't deliver on time!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know the soft serve ice cream maker didn't show up on aug.4th like it was supposed too, like the ice cream ingredients did, Amazon prime lied.
customer_reviews.author: marcia butler

customer_reviews.title: A Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The Chocolate was delicious but the strawberry and Vanilla was a solid chuck. The only way to use the vanilla and strawberry was to bust with a hammer and grind up in food processor. The strawberry and vanilla had no flavor - so bland I threw in the trash..
customer_reviews.author: galsal

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick, tasty ice cream
customer_reviews.text: The mix is easy to use and makes tasty ice cream. Great for soft serve.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in NOLA

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more flavor, more ice cream, more cost effectiveness. Buying this makes no sense unless you want to do a science experiment and just want to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Patience404

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Odd to use, powdery taste and dry consistency. Better off using real ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgey429

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream mix is really good, very simple to use, good texture and taste great. I've used others but this is by far the best tasting. Follow measurements and slowly add milk then heavy cream to mix. Refrigerate for a bit, make it and enjoy. And you will enjoy. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Chris Albergo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and perfect size for amount to be made in bucket provided with ice cream maker.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this twice. The directions are so easy and the flavors are amazing especially when fruit or candy pieces are added while the ice cream is being mixed!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Swain

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Not what you want. You still need all the ingredients like milk and cream. This only has flavor and sugar. Not worth the money. Can’t even return the product. Don’t waste your money

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD. WE MADE A DOUBLE AMOUNT OF STRAWBERRY. AWESOME!

customer_reviews.title: No taste
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with the flavors and especially the strawberry then I tried the chocolate it was disappointing will not be buying this brand again

customer_reviews.title: Very good taste and smooth texture.
customer_reviews.text: In general they are very good and better than a cheaper brand we also tried. Simple to make and works great in our new machine. Both boxes of strawberry mix for some reason were almost a solid lump and more difficult to mix than the chocolate and vanilla.

customer_reviews.title: Try the old fashioned way!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I selected this product as a remembrance for me and insight for my grandchildren of how my mother and grandmother added jest to our desserts the old fashioned and cheaper( in those days) way!

customer_reviews.title: Soft Ice cream, very tasty

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Used for family event that featured a camp ball ice cream maker and a dish/scrape style maker. Tried vanilla and chocolate only. Held up to abuse and tasted good.

customer_reviews.title: Very good

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm
customer_reviews.text: Makes great ice cream and easy to get ready and serve on a moments notice. Thanks for the great service.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and easy to mix
customer_reviews.text: This mix makes the most delicious soft serve ice cream that my whole family enjoys

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Christmas and love them! They taste acutely pretty good if I do say so myself, and I am pretty picky! They also don’t require a lot of ingredients which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Vavold

customer_reviews.title: Junket=Grandma's Ice Cream!
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream mix was recommended to me by my husband's grandmother. She said that it was the mix that her family used in the 1980's and 1990's but that it is difficult to find on store shelves. I purchased it through Amazon and we immediately began making ice cream with it. We added fresh peaches to the vanilla and fresh strawberries to the strawberry. The ice cream is smooth, creamy, and amazing delicious. I will never go back to the ice cream mixes I used before Junket!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used the vanilla and strawberry. Added peaches and strawberries to it. Best tasting ice cream. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good price and excellent taste.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of using to make ice cream. Prefer to mKe my own instead of buying it.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!

Made the vanilla and we are looking forward to the chocolate and strawberry. Great product!! Thank you

product_meta.title: Junket Ice Cream Mix Bundle - 2 Vanilla, 2 Chocolate, 2 Strawberry (6 Total)
product_meta.description:
Junket Ice Cream Mix Bundle - 2 Vanilla, 2 Chocolate, 2 Strawberry (6 Total)

Make homemade ice cream quickly and easily with All Natural Junket Ice Cream Mix. Enjoy the delicious simplicity of creamy Very Vanilla, the smoothly rich and decadent flavor of Dutch Chocolate or the all-natural, freshly picked flavor of Simply Strawberry. You could also add your own touch by mixing in nuts, candy or toppings. Gluten free, Junket Ice Cream mix is indulgent, wholesome fun. With this bundle you’ll get 3 flavors, Very Vanilla, Dutch Chocolate and Simply Strawberry (two boxes each); for buying convenience. The boxes also feature two sets of directions on the back, one that requires an ice cream maker, and one that does not.

Very Vanilla Ingredients: Sugar, dried corn syrup, non-fat milk powder, guar gum, carrageenan and gum arabic, natural vanilla flavor with other natural flavors. Contains milk products.

Dutch Chocolate Ingredients: Sugar, dutched cocoa, dried corn syrup, non-fat milk powder, guar gum, carrageenan and gum arabic. Contains milk products and soy lecithin.

Simply Strawberry Ingredients: Sugar, dried corn syrup, non-fat milk powder, natural strawberry with other natural flavors, beet juice, guar gum, carrageenan and gum arabic. Contains milk products.
feature_bullets: Bundle contains 2 Very Vanilla, 2 Dutch Chocolate, and 2 Simply Strawberry (6 - 4oz boxes)
Get 3 flavors in this convenient bundle, no more hassle of buying separately
Each 4 oz. box makes 1 quart of ice cream
Can be made with or without an ice cream maker
